text: Addo E. Bonetti (April 4, 1926 - June 6, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Connecticut House of Representatives from 1967 to 1979, as a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Torrington, Connecticut. Bonetti died on June 6, 2021 in Torrington at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Addo Bonetti
